languages.text: {n}Маражай крутит головой, обводя взглядом помещение — и оскаливается в кровожадном восторге.{/n} "Это одна из вышек-сателлитов основного шпиля Опустошительной бури... какая удача! Горло Иремерисс теперь куда ближе к моим когтям... только сначала разобраться с этими жалкими гостями моей ненаглядной сестры".

{n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай крутит головой, обводя взглядом помещение — и оскаливается в кровожадном восторге.{/n} "Это одна из вышек-сателлитов основного шпиля Опустошительной бури... какая удача! Горло Иремерисс теперь куда ближе к моим когтям... только сначала разобраться с этими жалкими гостями моей ненаглядной сестры".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai twists his head around, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest..... what luck! Yremeryss's throat is now much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai balaie la salle du regard et un sourire diabolique s'étire sur son visage.{/n} « C'est l'une des tours adjacentes à la tour principale de la Tempête ravageuse... Quelle chance ! Mes griffes n'ont jamais été aussi près de la gorge d'Yremeryss... Mais d'abord, je vais m'occuper des pitoyables hôtes de ma sœur. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai balaie la salle du regard et un sourire diabolique s'étire sur son visage.{/n} « C'est l'une des tours adjacentes à la tour principale de la Tempête ravageuse... Quelle chance ! Mes griffes n'ont jamais été aussi près de la gorge d'Yremeryss... Mais d'abord, je vais m'occuper des pitoyables hôtes de mes sœurs. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋转头来，环视着房间，露出恶魔般的愉悦笑容。{/n}“这里是狂风阴谋团其中一座主要尖塔……运气不错！伊芮梅莉斯的喉咙离我的利爪更近了……不过，我得先替我姐姐招待一下这些不值一提的客人才行。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋扭过头来，环视着房间，露出恶魔般的愉悦笑容。{/n}“这里是狂风阴谋团其中一座主要尖塔……我运气不错！伊芮梅莉斯的喉咙离我的利爪更近了……不过，我得先替我妹妹招待一下这些不值一提的客人才行。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは首をひねって部屋を見渡し、悪魔のような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「ここはリーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔を取り囲む塔のひとつなのか…なんて幸運だ！俺の爪はイレメリスの喉元にグッと近づいているようだ…だがその前に、我が姉妹の哀れな客人どもの相手をしなければな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは首をひねって部屋を見渡し、悪魔のような笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「ここはリーヴィング・テンペストの尖塔を取り囲む塔のひとつなのか…いいぞ、ついている！俺の爪はイレメリスの喉元にグッと近づいているようだ…だがその前に、我が姉妹の哀れな客人どもの相手をしなければな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai dreht den Kopf, sieht sich im Raum um und grinst voll teuflischer Wonne.{/n} "Das ist einer der Satellitentürme des Hauptturms des plündernden Sturms ... Was für ein Glück! Jetzt ist Yremeryss' Kehle meinen Klauen viel näher... Aber vorher muss ich mich noch um die mitleiderregenden Gäste meiner Schwester kümmern."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai dreht den Kopf, schaut sich im Raum um und grinst voll teuflischer Wonne.{/n} "Das ist einer der Satellitentürme des Hauptturms des plündernden Sturms ... Ich habe Glück! Meine Klauen sind Yremeryss' Kehle näher gekommen ... Aber vorher muss ich mich noch um die mitleiderregenden Gäste meiner Schwester kümmern."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gira la cabeza, examinando la sala y esbozando una sonrisa de cruel deleite.{/n} «Es una de las torres satélite del edificio principal de la Tempestad Asoladora... ¡Qué suerte! La garganta de Yremeryss está ahora mucho más cerca de mis garras... pero antes he de encargarme de los patéticos invitados de mi hermana».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai mueve la cabeza en derredor, examinando la sala y esbozando una sonrisa de cruel deleite.{/n} «Es una de las torres de satélites del edificio principal de la Tempestad Asoladora... ¡Estoy de suerte! La garganta de Yremeryss está ahora mucho más cerca de mis garras... pero antes he de encargarme de los patéticos invitados de mi hermana».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai kafasını çeviriyor, odaya göz atıyor ve gaddarca zevk alarak sırıtıyor.{/n} "Burası, Müfteris Kasırga'nın ana kulesinin yan burçlarından biri... Şansa bak! Yremeryss'in gırtlağı, artık pençelerime çok daha yakın... Tabii önce ablamın zavallı konuklarının icabına bakmam lazım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai turns his head, looking around the room and grinning in fiendish delight.{/n} "This is one of the satellite towers of the main spire of the Reaving Tempest... What luck! Yremeryss's throat is now that much closer to my claws... But first I have to deal with my sister's pathetic guests."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai kafasını çeviriyor, odaya göz atıyor ve gaddarca zevk alarak sırıtıyor.{/n} "Burası, Müfteris Kasırga'nın ana kulesinin yan burçlarından biri... Şansa bak! Yremeryss'in gırtlağı artık pençelerime çok daha yakın... Ama önce kız kardeşimin zavallı konuklarının icabına bakmam lazım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
